Reviews.Title: All Around Good Bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Gale "Our Dogs' Mom"
Reviews.Content: Our Bedroom is 16' x 12' and we needed a good all around HD ready, LCD Flat Screen TV for the room, and this 20" fit our criteria nicely.  It sits on the dresser and blends into the rest of the room well. The Instruction Manual for the remote control was well written & easy to understand. The picture and sound quality is just fine for our needs.  We dont have the HD set up yet, so I can speak to that, but this is a very nice TV for the money.

Reviews.Title: good Toshiba
Reviews.Author: Fun Traveler
Reviews.Content: I have larger Toshiba LCD TV's that I use HD on and love.  THis is a smaller version that fits nicely on a kitchen countertop under the overhanging upper cabinets.  The picture is quite good without the HD converter and the sound is very good.  I spent $15 on a better cable (at Radio Shack) than the one provided and that helped a lot with picture quality.  One negative: it does not have a digital tuner built in.  No ad will tell you this, although Toshiba has a sticker on the front of the TV to inform the consumer.  This is true of any brand.

Reviews.Title: It is not as advertised and hard to hear
Reviews.Author: Marcia Kramer
Reviews.Content: the sound is muffled and there is a "block" that came with the TV. The picture, with cable, is fine.

Reviews.Title: size for kitchen
Reviews.Author: Vipin Patel, MD
Reviews.Content: fits finely on my kitchen counter top for esay viewing while cooking or eating at dinner table
